newsitem.title: FRANCE: Valeo announces new venture in India.
newsitem.headline: Valeo announces new venture in India.

text.p: French car parts manufacturer Valeo announced the signature of an agreement with India's Anand Group to produce clutch components in Madras.
Valeo will hold 60 percent of the joint venture which will come onstream in 1998 and produce parts for domestic and international clutch makers in India.

Last month Valeo and India's Amalgamations Ltd announced an agreement to form a joint venture called Amalgations Valeo Clutch Ltd. The new unit will be turning out clutch assemblies for automobile and lorry makers who produce in India.
Valeo is the world's leading clutch maker, and export markets pulled in 68 percent of total sales of 28.9 billion francs in 1996 .
